item.title: Auto Completion
item.description: Your browser does not support the video tag.

item.title: Embed Slides
item.description: Embed Slides into Obsidian Note By using slide code blocks you are able to embed an slide into an obsidian note. As parameter you have to specify the reference to the slides and the page you want to dislay Example ```slide { slide: [[Presentation]], page: 7 } ``` When using horizontal & vertical slides you can specify a page as following: 3/6 This would show the 6th vertical slide on the 3rd horizontal position.
